Uses of Package
edu.rit.pj2.tracker

  • Packages that use edu.rit.pj2.tracker 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.
    edu.rit.pj2.tracker
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tracker contains classes for the Parallel Java 2 (PJ2) Tracker and related classes.
  • Classes in edu.rit.pj2.tracker used by edu.rit.pj2 
    Class and Description
    BackendRef
    Interface BackendRef specifies the interface for invoking a backend.
    TaskInfo
    Class TaskInfo is a record of information about a Task in a Job.
  • Classes in edu.rit.pj2.tracker used by edu.rit.pj2.tracker 
    Class and Description
    BackendRef
    Interface BackendRef specifies the interface for invoking a backend.
    JobProperties
    Class JobProperties encapsulates the properties of a Job.
    JobRef
    Interface JobRef specifies the interface for invoking a Job.
    LauncherRef
    Interface LauncherRef specifies the interface for invoking a launcher.
    LoopProperties
    Class LoopProperties encapsulates the properties of a parallel loop.
    NodeProperties
    Class NodeProperties encapsulates the capabilities a computational node must have in order to run a certain PJ2 Task as part of a PJ2 Job.
    Receiver
    Class Receiver is the abstract base class for a thread that receives messages.
    ReceiverListener
    Interface ReceiverListener specifies the interface for an object that listens for notifications from a Receiver.
    Sender
    Class Sender is the abstract base class for an object that sends messages.
    TaskInfo
    Class TaskInfo is a record of information about a Task in a Job.
    TaskProperties
    Class TaskProperties encapsulates the properties of a Task.
    TaskSpecInfo
    Class TaskSpecInfo is a record of information about a TaskSpec in a Rule in a Job.
    TrackerRef
    Interface TrackerRef specifies the interface for invoking a tracker.
